title: Substitution
text: Substitute the constant value of $$x$$ into the second equation to write the second equation only in terms of $$y$$.

title: Substituted Expression
text: What is the resulting expression in terms of only $$y$$ after simplifying?

title: Possibility of Solutions
text: Since it is not possible for a squared number to be negative in the real numbers, the system of equations has no solution.
